question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [lift off and turn left facing left of the bridge and head straight. at the end of the road turn right facing the left of the pop bottle sign and head straight. at the left of the sign turn left facing the road and follow it. veer right to behind the bottle cap sign then veer left to the car wash sign. at the car wash sign turn right facing the yellow sign and head straight. veer right of the sign around the building. at the tall white building climb it to the top and stop at the top.]. You are moving according to a series of movement instructions. When you arrive at your current location, what is your position relative to the white tall building?  
choose:  
A. I am on the left side of the white tall building.  
B. I am on the ground of a white high-rise building.  
C. I am above a tall white building.  
D. I am on the right side of the white tall building.  
E. I am under a tall white building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The final instruction states to "climb it to the top and stop at the top," indicating that the current position is at the top of the tall white building, which means you are above it.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(132, 152)]
Option: [C]
Reason: The video shows the agent climbing the tall white building and stopping at the top. The view from the top shows other buildings below, indicating that the agent is above the tall white building.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: C; Reason: The final instruction states to "climb it to the top and stop at the top," indicating that the current position is at the top of the tall white building, which means you are above it.
